section.title: 7seg_Cfg.c
section.programlisting: 00001 #include "7seg.h" 00002 #include "7seg_Cfg.h" 00003 00004 00005 #define SEVEN_SEG_ONE_SELECTOR_PIN SEVEN_SEG_ONE_SELECTOR 00006 #define SEVEN_SEG_TWO_SELECTOR_PIN SEVEN_SEG_TWO_SELECTOR 00007 #define SEVEN_SEG_ONE_CONFGI_INDEX SEVEN_SEG_CONGIF 00008 #define SEVEN_SEG_TWO_CONFGI_INDEX SEVEN_SEG_CONGIF 00009 00010 00011 const sevenSegConfigStruct sevenSegConfigParam[SEVEN_SEG_NUM] = 00012 { 00013 { 00014 SEVEN_SEG_ONE_SELECTOR, 00015 SEVEN_SEG_CONGIF 00016 }, 00017 { 00018 SEVEN_SEG_TWO_SELECTOR, 00019 SEVEN_SEG_CONGIF 00020 } 00021 };
